sentences.en: Further scans are required to confirm the diagnosis of an abnormality.
sentences.cn: 需要做进一步的扫描来确诊异常情况。

sentences.en: Researchers are still trying to isolate the gene that causes this abnormality.
sentences.cn: 研究人员仍然在试图分离导致这种畸形的基因。

sentences.en: Caitlin was born with a life-threatening heart abnormality.
sentences.cn: 凯特琳先天患有危及生命的心脏病。
